ShuttlePlus
  • Home
  • Services
  • Destinations
  • Our Fleet
  • Reviews
  • Blog
  • Contact
Corporate Book Transfer
Bole International Airport (ADD)

Addis Ababa
Airport Transfers

Professional airport pickup and drop-off services in Ethiopia. Fixed prices, flight tracking, and meet & greet included. No negotiation, no surprises.

0K+ Transfers Completed
0min Free Waiting Time
0% On-Time Pickups

Book Your Transfer

Free cancellation up to 24 hours before pickup

Scroll to explore

Trusted by international organizations & hotels

Ethiopian Airlines
Sheraton Addis
African Union
UN ECA
Radisson Blu
Our Services

Professional Airport Transfer Services

From Bole International Airport to anywhere in Addis Ababa and beyond

Meet & Greet Service

Your driver waits at arrivals with a name sign. Assistance with luggage and escort to your vehicle. Perfect for first-time visitors.

  • Driver waiting at arrivals hall
  • Personalized name sign
  • Luggage assistance included
  • 60 minutes free waiting
Book Now

Departure Transfers

Punctual pickup from your hotel or residence. We monitor traffic and ensure you reach Bole Airport with time to spare.

  • On-time hotel pickup
  • Flight schedule awareness
  • Traffic monitoring
  • Help with check-in luggage
Book Now

Corporate Accounts

Dedicated transportation solutions for businesses, NGOs, and international organizations operating in Ethiopia.

  • Monthly invoicing in ETB/USD
  • Dedicated account manager
  • Priority booking 24/7
  • Detailed travel reports
Learn More

Hourly Charter

Book a vehicle with chauffeur by the hour for business meetings, city tours, or day trips to nearby attractions.

  • Flexible 4-12 hour packages
  • Multiple stops included
  • English-speaking drivers
  • City tours available
Book Now
Why Shuttle Plus

The Smarter Way to Travel from Bole Airport

Say goodbye to price negotiations and unreliable taxis

The Old Way

  • Price negotiation at arrival
  • Risk of tourist overcharging
  • No flight delay accommodation
  • Uncertain vehicle quality
  • Language barriers
  • Cash-only payments

The Shuttle Plus Way

  • Fixed price confirmed at booking
  • Same rate for locals & visitors
  • Automatic flight tracking
  • Modern, inspected vehicles
  • English-speaking drivers
  • Card, mobile & cash payments
Popular Routes

Fixed-Price Transfers from Bole Airport

Transparent pricing to all major destinations in Addis Ababa

Bole District Hotels

Ethiopian Skylight, Golden Tulip, Capital Hotel

2-5 km from airport
From 1,040 ETB

8-10 km from airport
From 1,560 ETB

Entoto Park, historical churches, viewpoints

15-18 km from airport
From 2,340 ETB

Merkato Market

Africa's largest open-air market

12-14 km from airport
From 1,950 ETB

Prices shown are for Standard Sedan (up to 3 passengers, 2 bags). All prices include meet & greet, 60 min waiting time, and flight tracking.

Our Fleet

Choose Your Vehicle Class

Modern, air-conditioned vehicles maintained to international standards

Popular

Up to 3 3 large bags
Bole to City Center 4,550 ETB
Select

Flight Tracking

We monitor your flight in real-time. If delayed, your driver adjusts automatically. No extra charges.

Fixed Prices

The price you see is the price you pay. No surge pricing, no negotiation, no hidden fees.

60 Min Free Wait

One hour complimentary waiting after landing. Plenty of time for immigration and baggage.

24/7 Support

Our team is available around the clock. WhatsApp, phone, and email support in English and Amharic.

Testimonials

What Our Passengers Say

Trusted by business travelers, tourists, and organizations

"After years of negotiating with taxi drivers at Bole, Shuttle Plus was a revelation. Driver was waiting with my name, car was clean and air-conditioned. Price was exactly what I paid online. This is how it should be!"

Dr. Sarah Mitchell

UN Consultant, New York

"My Ethiopian Airlines flight from Frankfurt was delayed 3 hours. I was worried about my transfer but the driver tracked my flight and was there when I landed at 2 AM. Incredible service!"

Klaus Weber

Business Traveler, Germany

"We use Shuttle Plus for all our staff airport transfers. The corporate account makes billing simple, and the service is consistently excellent. Highly recommend for organizations in Addis."

Tigist Alemayehu

Operations Manager, NGO
For Business

Corporate & Organization Accounts

Streamlined airport transfer solutions for businesses, NGOs, embassies, and international organizations operating in Ethiopia.

Monthly Invoicing

Consolidated billing in ETB or USD. No individual payments needed.

Dedicated Manager

Personal account manager for bookings, changes, and support.

Travel Reports

Detailed monthly reports for expense tracking and compliance.

Volume Discounts

Preferential rates for high-volume accounts.

content.text:
Perfect! Now I have a comprehensive understanding of the project. Let me compile the findings:

## Comprehensive Project Analysis: Rideshare Website (Shuttle Plus)

### 1. FILE AND FOLDER STRUCTURE

```
C:\Users\EVAD\.claude\projects\rideshare-website/
├── index.html                              (Main landing page - 856 lines)
├── css/
│   ├── style.css                          (Primary stylesheet - 1,925 lines)
│   └── blog.css                           (Blog page styles - 500 lines)
├── js/
│   └── main.js                            (Main JavaScript - 404 lines)
├── pages/
│   └── blog.html                          (Blog page)
├── images/
│   ├── 1600px-AddisView-1280x625.jpg      (Background image for blog)
│   └── logo.png                           (Shuttle Plus logo)
├── ShuttlePlus_FullDoc_comments.docx      (Documentation)
├── ShuttlePlus_FullDoc_comments.pdf       (PDF documentation)
├── shuttle-plus-fares.md                  (Fare information in markdown)
└── shuttle-plus-fares.pdf                 (Fare information in PDF)
```

**Notable Observation:** No PWA manifest, service worker, or progressive web app configuration files present.

---

### 2. CURRENT TECH STACK

- **HTML5**: Modern semantic markup with viewport meta tags
- **CSS3**: Custom properties (CSS variables), Grid layouts, Flexbox, animations
- **JavaScript (Vanilla ES6+)**: No frameworks - pure JavaScript for interactivity
- **Font System**: 
  - Google Fonts: Inter (weights 300-800) via CDN
  - Font Awesome 6.4.0 icons via CDN
- **Libraries**: None (no jQuery, React, Vue, etc.)
- **Backend**: None visible - client-side only currently

---

### 3. EXISTING BOOKING FORM STRUCTURE

**Location**: Hero section in `index.html` (lines 81-147)

**Form ID**: `bookingForm`

**Current Form Fields**:
1. **Flight Number** 
   - Type: Text input
   - Placeholder: "e.g. ET 500, LH 590"
   - Icon: `fas fa-plane-arrival`
   - Required: Yes

2. **Drop-off Location** 
   - Type: Select dropdown with optgroups
   - Options include:
     - Hotels Near Airport (Ethiopian Skylight, Golden Tulip, Capital Hotel)
     - Hotels City Center (Sheraton Addis, Radisson Blu, Hyatt Regency, Best Western)
     - Business Districts (Bole, Kazanchis, African Union HQ, UN ECA)
     - Other Address (custom entry)
   - Icon: `fas fa-map-marker-alt`
   - Required: Yes

3. **Arrival Date**
   - Type: Date input
   - Icon: `fas fa-calendar`
   - Required: Yes
   - **Validation**: Minimum date set to today via JavaScript (line 236-241 in main.js)

4. **Flight Time**
   - Type: Time input
   - Icon: `fas fa-clock`
   - Required: Yes

5. **Passengers & Luggage**
   - Type: Select dropdown
   - Options:
     - 1-2 Passengers, 2 Bags
     - 3-4 Passengers, 4 Bags
     - 5-6 Passengers, 6 Bags
     - 7+ Passengers (Group)
   - Icon: `fas fa-users`

**Form Features**:
- Booking tabs for "From Airport" and "To Airport" (lines 85-88)
- "Get Instant Quote" submit button with arrow icon
- Cancellation policy note below form
- Card-based design with rounded corners and shadow

**Form Styling Applied**:
- Background: White (#ffffff)
- Border radius: 1.5rem
- Max-width: 420px
- Box shadow: var(--shadow-xl)

---

### 4. CSS DESIGN SYSTEM & VARIABLES

**Primary Color Palette** (defined in `:root`, lines 6-41 of style.css):

| Variable | Value | Purpose |
|----------|-------|---------|
| `--primary` | #597B87 | Pantone 645 C - Muted blue-gray |
| `--primary-dark` | #183251 | Pantone 540 C - Deep navy (anchor) |
| `--primary-light` | #c4cbdb | Pantone 538 C - Light gray-blue |
| `--secondary` | #597B87 | Accent (same as primary) |
| `--accent` | #00b4d8 | Cyan for logo emphasis |
| `--success` | #10b981 | Green for success states |

**Gray Scale**:
- `--gray-900`: #183251 (Deep navy)
- `--gray-800`: #2a4a66 (Darker blend)
- `--gray-700`: #6c747c (Body text - Cool Gray 9 C)
- `--gray-600`: #6c747c
- `--gray-500`: #597B87
- `--gray-400`: #c4c4c4 (Pantone 424 C)
- `--gray-300`: #c4cbdb
- `--gray-200`: #e0e4eb
- `--gray-100`: #f0f2f5
- `--gray-50`: #f7f8fa

**Border Radius System**:
- `--radius-sm`: 0.375rem (6px)
- `--radius`: 0.5rem (8px)
- `--radius-lg`: 0.75rem (12px)
- `--radius-xl`: 1rem (16px)
- `--radius-2xl`: 1.5rem (24px)
- `--radius-full`: 9999px (pill-shaped)

**Shadow System**:
- `--shadow-sm`: Subtle
- `--shadow`: Standard
- `--shadow-md`: Medium elevation
- `--shadow-lg`: Large elevation
- `--shadow-xl`: Extra large elevation

**Gradients**:
- `--gradient`: 135deg from primary-dark to primary (main brand gradient)
- `--gradient-dark`: 135deg from dark to #2a4a66

**Typography**:
- Font Family: 'Inter', system fonts
- Base Font Size: 16px
- Line Height: 1.6

---

### 5. EXISTING JAVASCRIPT FUNCTIONALITY

**Location**: `js/main.js` (404 lines)

**Initialization** (DOMContentLoaded):
Loads all modules automatically on page load:
```javascript
- initNavbar()
- initMobileMenu()
- initBookingTabs()
- initCounterAnimation()
- initSmoothScroll()
- initFormHandlers()
- initScrollAnimations()
```

**Key Functions**:

1. **Navbar Scroll Effect** (lines 19-32)
   - Adds `.scrolled` class when scroll > 50px
   - Changes navbar styling on scroll
   - Used for: Dynamic navbar transparency and background

2. **Mobile Menu Toggle** (lines 37-102)
   - Hamburger menu for mobile devices
   - Dynamic CSS injection
   - Closes menu on link click
   - Toggles active state on menu button

3. **Booking Form Tabs** (lines 107-116)
   - Switches between "From Airport" and "To Airport" tabs
   - Manages active state

4. **Counter Animation** (lines 121-154)
   - Animates stat numbers on hero section (15K+, 60min, 99%)
   - Uses Intersection Observer for viewport detection
   - Smooth counting animation over 2000ms duration

5. **Smooth Scroll** (lines 159-199)
   - Smooth scrolling for anchor links (#sections)
   - Updates active nav link on scroll based on viewport position
   - Header offset: 80px

6. **Form Handlers** (lines 204-243)
   - **Booking Form**: Accepts FormData, shows success notification, resets form
   - **Contact Form**: Shows success message, resets form
   - **Date Inputs**: Sets minimum date to today, pre-fills with today's date

7. **Notification System** (lines 248-326)
   - Dynamic notification component injection
   - Supports success/info states
   - Auto-dismisses after 5 seconds
   - Styled with slide-in animation

8. **Scroll Animations** (lines 331-368)
   - Fade-in effect on `.service-card`, `.fleet-card`, `.feature`, `.testimonial-card`
   - Uses Intersection Observer
   - Staggered animation delays

**Utility Functions**:
- `debounce(func, wait)` - Performance optimization
- `formatCurrency(amount, currency)` - Currency formatting (defaults to USD)
- `formatDate(date)` - Date formatting

**No External Dependencies**: Code is vanilla JavaScript, no frameworks

---

### 6. FORM VALIDATION

**Current Validation Status**: 
- HTML5 native validation only (required attributes)
- No custom server-side validation
- No email validation
- No format checking for flight numbers

**Applied Validations**:
- All booking form fields: `required`
- Date input: minimum value set to today
- Date pre-fill: today's date

---

### 7. API INTEGRATIONS & PLACEHOLDERS

**Current State**: 
- **No actual API integrations present**
- Form submission is client-side only
- Shows placeholder notification for success

**Contact Points Visible**:
```javascript
// Lines 208-219 (Booking Form Handler)
// Lines 225-234 (Contact Form Handler)
```
Both forms show success notifications but don't actually submit data anywhere.

**Contact Information Placeholder** (lines 724-761 in index.html):
- WhatsApp: +251 91 234 5678
- Phone: +251 11 234 5678
- Email: bookings@shuttleplus.com
- Office: Bole District, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia

---

### 8. PAGE SECTIONS & FEATURES

**index.html Sections**:
1. **Navigation** - Fixed navbar with logo, links, and mobile menu
2. **Hero** - Large background with booking card (main CTA)
3. **Partners** - Trust indicators section
4. **Services** - 4 service cards (Meet & Greet, Departure, Corporate, Hourly Charter)
5. **Why Choose Us** - Comparison between old vs Shuttle Plus way
6. **Destinations** - 6 destination cards with fixed prices
7. **Fleet** - 4 vehicle classes (Standard, Executive, SUV, Luxury)
8. **Features** - 4 key benefits (Flight Tracking, Fixed Prices, Free Wait, 24/7 Support)
9. **Testimonials** - 3-card slider with reviews
10. **Corporate** - B2B account features section
11. **App Download** - Coming soon mobile app section with phone mockup
12. **CTA** - Call-to-action section
13. **Contact** - Contact form and information
14. **Footer** - Multi-column footer with links

**blog.html Sections**:
1. **Blog Hero** - Full-width hero with background image
2. **Featured Article** - Large featured blog card
3. **Category Filter** - 6 category buttons (All, Landmarks, Culture, Food, Nature, Tips)
4. **Blog Categories**:
   - Historical Landmarks
   - Culture & Heritage
   - Food & Dining
   - Nature & Outdoor
   - Travel Tips

---

### 9. RESPONSIVE BREAKPOINTS

Defined in style.css:
- **1200px**: Grid adjustments (2 columns)
- **992px**: Major layout shifts (single column layouts, mobile menu activation)
- **768px**: Typography scaling, full-width cards
- **480px**: Form adjustments, reduced spacing

---

### 10. MISSING PWA/SERVICE WORKER FILES

- **No manifest.json** - No PWA configuration
- **No service-worker.js** - No offline capability
- **No sw.js** - No alternate service worker
- **No offline page** - No fallback for offline users

This is a standard website with no progressive web app features.

---

### 11. PRICING INFORMATION

From HTML destinations section (lines 284-369):
- Bole District Hotels: 1,040 ETB
- City Center/Piazza: 1,560 ETB
- African Union/UN ECA: 1,300 ETB
- Kazanchis Business: 1,430 ETB
- Entoto Hill Area: 2,340 ETB
- Merkato Market: 1,950 ETB

Fleet pricing (Bole to City Center):
- Standard Sedan: 1,560 ETB
- Executive Sedan: 2,340 ETB
- SUV/Minivan: 3,250 ETB
- Luxury Class: 4,550 ETB

---

### 12. KEY INSIGHTS

1. **Clean, Modern Design**: Consistent use of design variables and system
2. **Mobile-First Approach**: Comprehensive responsive design with multiple breakpoints
3. **No Backend**: Entirely frontend - forms don't submit anywhere
4. **No JavaScript Framework**: Lightweight vanilla JS with good performance
5. **Accessibility**: Uses Font Awesome icons with proper labeling
6. **SEO Ready**: Meta descriptions, semantic HTML, proper heading hierarchy
7. **Brand Consistency**: Color palette and design tokens applied throughout
8. **Performance**: No heavy libraries, minimal external dependencies (only fonts and icons)
9. **User Experience**: Smooth scrolling, animations, notifications, form validation

---

This comprehensive analysis provides all the information needed for understanding the current state of the Shuttle Plus rideshare website project.
